pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data from Surveys Conducted by Forwards // Anonymized data from surveys conducted by Forwards https://forwards.github.io/, the R Foundation task force on women and other under-represented groups. Currently, a single data set of responses to a survey of attendees at useR! 2016 https://www.r-project.org/useR-2016/, the R user conference held at Stanford University, Stanford, California, USA, June 27 - June 30 2016.
